Service Details: -Lake Country Health Hub provides information, support, advocacy, community resources and assistance in navigating services related to health and wellness. Services are available to all residents.- Local programs to support people in their community (contact us for further information):Better at Home, Health & Wellness Fair, Wise & Well, Volunteer Friendly Visiting and Driving program, Family & Friends Caregiver Support Group, Active Agers- Volunteer opportunities are available to support services and programs
Major Intersection: South of the Berry Road traffic circle on Main Street
